WHAT DOES THE FUTURE HOLD.Definition: what is likely to happen in the future

GROSS MARGIN.Definition: the difference between a company's revenue and cost of goods or services sold

DIE-HARD.Definition: very supportive no matter what, hardcore

ON AIR.Definition: while being broadcast or talking during the interview

WHISTLEBLOWER.Definition: a person, an employee, who revealed information about illegal activities within a private or public organisation

DISGRACED.Definition: having brought shame or dishonour on himself

TALK-SHOW HOST.Definition: presenter of a program on which celebrities are interviewed

REMARKABLE.Definition: unusual or special, worthy of attention

FOR HOURS ON END.Definition: for a long period of time

HANG ON HIS EVERY WORD.Definition: pay very close attention to what he says

APPEAL.Definition: the quality of being attractive or interesting

CULMINATED.Definition: reached its highest point of development

CRITICS.Definition: people who expressed their disapproval, who thought it was wrong

RECKLESS.Definition: not showing careful thought about the risks involved

PUT UP ITS HANDS.Definition: expressed that they weren't responsible for it

OPEN LETTER.Definition: a letter addressed to Spotify but also made public

ATTRACTIVENESS.Definition: the quality of being interesting or attractive

MISLEADING.Definition: giving the wrong idea or impression

CANNY BET.Definition: a decision that shows good judgement

ALGORITHM.Definition: a set of rules that helps computers to calculate results
